doc.title: Za momichetata i tyahnata Neshka Robeva
doc.plot: The film is a sequel of 'About Neshka Robeva And Her Girls'. An attempt to analyze the process of creation (generally) through the dance miniatures, created by the trainer and three of her competitors in modern and rhythmic gymnastics. The problems of creative compromise, of the 'scissors' between author's imagination and audience's desires, of the judges' criteria (no matter if they are called 'jury' or 'critics') are observed.
